question: Can i offer my Qazza-e-Ummri with Farz Namaz without offering Sunnat-e-Muqada.....
answer:
QUESTION

(1) If i want to offer my Qazza-e-Ummri with Regular Namaz, why is it important to offer Sunnat-e-Muqada with Farz ...because as far as Sunnat-e-Muqada concern Prophet Mohammad (SAW) gives us only Farz Salaat which Allah has gave Him as a Gift.

(2) Can i offer my Qazza-e-Ummri with Farz Namaz without offering Sunnat-e-Muqada.....

ANSWER


Share:

According to Shariah, there is no Qadha for missed Sunnah Salaah. Therefore, it is not necessary to perform the Sunnah Salaah of the missed Fardh Salaah.

And Allah Knows Best

Muhammed Zakariyya Desai
